summary:
A versatile Geologist with 17 years of diverse global experience in the energy industry, spanning conventional to unconventional exploration in frontier and mature settings in the South Atlantic: Africa & South America, North America, West Siberia and Southeast Asia, creating value through portfolio generation and fostering a commercial mindset. 

A proven explorer with extensive experience in clastics to carbonates, leveraging strengths in stratigraphic and structural seismic interpretation, well log data analysis and correlation, 3D modelling and mapping, geophysical workflows (seismic attribute analysis, gravity & magnetics), resource assessment, and data integration/management, with a strong HSSE focus. 

An adaptable, reliable, and empathic team player that champions diversity & inclusiveness through collaboration, trust and openness. As a volunteer Care Ambassador, I advocate for mental wellbeing on a global scale. 

In my spare time, you'll find a camera in my hand capturing the natural beauty of the ocean or exploring the country where I'm living and immersing myself in their culture.
